answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources that you may find helpful.
This is a Comprehensive Citizen Engagement Program from the City of Windsor Heights, IA. It details the way they have improved community communications.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303026/ICMA_Strategic_Leadership__Governance_Awards
This report is about, Communication and Citizen Participation: Blending Old Tools with New Technology.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7352/Communication_and_Citizen_Participation_Blending_Old_Tools_with_New_Technology
You can read a similar report below called, Local Governments as a Partner in Citizen Engagement and Community Building.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301763/Connected_Communities_Local_Governments_as_a_Partner_in_Citizen_Engagement_and_Community_Building
The City of Virginia Beach, VA uses a Citizen Communication and Interrelationships Work Group. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7136/Report_of_the_Citizen_Communication_and_Interrelationships_Work_Group
Here is a PowerPoint presentation from Los Alamos County, NM about Tools for Communication.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7357/Tools_for_Communication_Marketing_Surveys_and_Outreach
In Mesa Grande, AZ a smart phone app has been developed to improve communication.
http://icma.org/en/Article/101493/Casa_Grande_AZ_Goes_Mobile_with_New_Phone_App
This report discusses, Why Public Hearings Need to be Augmented via the Internet.
http://icma.org/en/Article/101278/Online_Public_Comment_Forums

title: Killer Communication Strategies
